attributes.action: Rather than give our MP's 11% pay rise, integrate fully with the EU and sack our MP's
attributes.additional_details:
Mps having an 11% pay rise when the rest of the country is having to tighten its belt. MP's have been known to fiddle their expenses, avoid answering questions and blame the opposition no matter how petty to distract us from their failings.

Lets have a debate on if we need our parliament and join the EU so they are no longer required.

I know it is very unlikely it will ever happen, but it might put the fear of god in them and make them realize we are having enough of their childish behavior
